title: Agriculture University Recruitment 2025 - Apply for Young Professional I Posts
description: Assam Agriculture University has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Young Professional Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.Sc can grab this chance and apply for the Agriculture University Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts.
